hero.title: Missing & Murdered
hero.subtitle: Indigenous Women, Girls & Two-Spirited People
hero.tagline: Honouring their lives. Remembering their names.

gallery.heading: Highlighted Stories
gallery.intro: Through sharing the stories of six individuals, we highlight a number of themes and barriers experienced by each of them and by many affected by this national crisis.
gallery.permissionNote: Giganawenimaanaanig received permission from families of individuals highlighted in these stories.

helen.title: Helen Betty Osborne, 19
helen.description: Found murdered near The Pas in 1971.

jessica.title: Jessica Michaels, 17
jessica.description: Her family suspects foul play was involved in her death in 2001.

divas.title: Divas Boulanger, 24
divas.description: Found murdered near Portage la Prairie in 2004.

lorna.title: Lorna Blacksmith, 18
lorna.description: Lived in Winnipeg at the time of her murder in 2011.

phoenix.title: Phoenix Sinclair, 5
phoenix.location: From: Ochekiwi Sipi (Fisher River Cree Nation)
phoenix.description: Found murdered in Fisher River Cree Nation in 2005.
